channel.title: Comments on: Oh Pants Graphic, Where Art Thou?

item.title: By: debeast
item.dc:creator: debeast
item.description:
My missus loved em and TBH so did i (but only wore em when no one was looking)
/beastie
item.content:encoded:
My missus loved em and TBH so did i (but only wore em when no one was looking)

/beastie

item.title: By: jerry
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description: I dont believe ppl bitch as much about this outgame as they do ingame. The game is math, stats>>>appearance. If yer guildies make fun of yer hotpants, cope or change em.
item.content:encoded: I dont believe ppl bitch as much about this outgame as they do ingame. The game is math, stats>>>appearance. If yer guildies make fun of yer hotpants, cope or change em.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
Hahah, I just got those for my priest and I love them! It was great showing them off to my other half's pally... muahahhaa. They cover up just a little bit more than the 'naked' pants, apart from more leg covering around from the knee down. Awesome.
They obviously haven't tried on the Raptorbane Armor either... as it *bare*ly covered anything up on my rather lovely buxom dwarf
item.content:encoded:
Hahah, I just got those for my priest and I love them! It was great showing them off to my other half’s pally… muahahhaa. They cover up just a little bit more than the ‘naked’ pants, apart from more leg covering around from the knee down. Awesome.

They obviously haven’t tried on the Raptorbane Armor either… as it *bare*ly covered anything up on my rather lovely buxom dwarf

item.title: By: geo
item.dc:creator: geo
item.description: I think bliz should make skimpy costumes for male characters as well. I'd love to see more skin on my priest and yes I'm queer. =P
item.content:encoded: I think bliz should make skimpy costumes for male characters as well. I’d love to see more skin on my priest and yes I’m queer. =P

item.title: By: Kwaulzahh
item.dc:creator: Kwaulzahh
item.description: Whiner... she's obviously never run around in a set of Warbear Woolies, never had the experience of multiple gnomes standing behind your toon and typing /sniff, i.e. never lived.
item.content:encoded: Whiner… she’s obviously never run around in a set of Warbear Woolies, never had the experience of multiple gnomes standing behind your toon and typing /sniff, i.e. never lived.

item.title: By: rosemary
item.dc:creator: rosemary
item.description: How about Blizzard designing some leggings for male characters that look just like tighty-whities? How the complaints would roll in, I'd guess.
item.content:encoded: How about Blizzard designing some leggings for male characters that look just like tighty-whities? How the complaints would roll in, I’d guess.

item.title: By: Cyndre
item.dc:creator: Cyndre
item.description: I would rather pants that show off my hawt legs, then the rediculous hot pink and neon green 80's hip waders I am wearing now. Worst part of expansions is you look like a pile of retro dirty laundry for a few months until you get to the next set gear tier.
item.content:encoded: I would rather pants that show off my hawt legs, then the rediculous hot pink and neon green 80’s hip waders I am wearing now. Worst part of expansions is you look like a pile of retro dirty laundry for a few months until you get to the next set gear tier.

item.title: By: Miz
item.dc:creator: Miz
item.description: Frankly I welcome clothes that aren't damn ugly robes that tie my feet together. For so long all high end gear for casters HAD to be a robe, now at least there's a choice.
item.content:encoded: Frankly I welcome clothes that aren’t damn ugly robes that tie my feet together. For so long all high end gear for casters HAD to be a robe, now at least there’s a choice.
